title: Dissentient

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- When you fulfill your Destiny, all good players who voted for you permanently have +1 vote against them (secretly. Not revealed until they would be hammered.)
- If you are killed at night by the Town, your killer gets your auto-vest if you still have it.
- Your Destiny is only checked at the end of each day. You do not fulfill your Destiny if you die.

fields.name: Destiny:
fields.value: Accumulate 10 votes over the course of the game.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Have each living Peasant fulfill their Destiny.

desc:
Post 4473
*"I never wanted lightning, just thunder."*
